title: Type ID for italic face
content:
Looking for the typeface used for 'union special' or something very very close to it. Thanks in advanced.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-02-26 at 1.38.29 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204036/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-26%20at%201.38.29%20PM.png) | 53.32 KB |
author: markmont

comments.content: I would probably start from [Terital](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204036/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterbox/terital-united) using some stylistic alternates (/ [U](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204036/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterbox/terital-united/terital-united/glyphs.html#glyphs/508401/529), / [ɛ](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204036/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterbox/terital-united/terital-united/glyphs.html#glyphs/508401/513))
